Description:
Detects suspicious process related to rundll32 based on command line that includes a *.sys file as seen being used by UNC2452

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Rundll32 Activity Invoking Sys File
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%rundll32.exe%' and (command like '%.sys,%' or command like '%.sys %'))
